tool.name: Import OME.TIFF
tool.help:
**Description**
Downloads an OME.TIFF from URL and validates the file using BioFormats_ command line tools_.
-----
**Input**
* A link to an existing OME.TIFF (URL)
-----
**Output**
* If the file is a valid OME.TIFF, then the file placed in the workspace of the current history. False otherwise.
.. _BioFormats: http://www.openmicroscopy.org/site/products/bio-formats .. _tools: http://www.openmicroscopy.org/site/support/bio-formats5.5/users/comlinetools
